Cards.Name: Achieve C1 level in English
Cards.Description: English is widely used as the language of instruction in universities and educational institutions around the world.

Cards.Name: Attain mathematical proficiency
Cards.Description: Mathematics teaches analytical thinking and problem-solving skills.

Cards.Name: Learn JavaScript
Cards.Description: JavaScript is a versatile language that can be used for both front-end and back-end development.

Cards.Name: Read 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
Cards.Description: Set during the Roaring Twenties, Fitzgerald's novel captures the glamour, decadence, and disillusionment of the Jazz Age.

Cards.Name: Achieve personal best in weightlifting
Cards.Description: Weightlifting promotes overall physical fitness by improving strength, muscle tone, and endurance.

Cards.Name: Achieve B2 level in German
Cards.Description: German language and culture have made significant contributions to the fields of literature, philosophy, music, art, and science.
